body_content.explanation: someone from the US city of New York:
examples: I was accompanied by a New Yorker from the Bronx.
New Yorkers mostly take film crews for granted, living as they do in one of the most famous cities in the world.

body_content.explanation: someone from the US state of New York:
examples: New Yorkers and New Jerseyans try to get around fireworks bans in their home states by buying them in Pennsylvania.
Banks made his reputation exploring the lives and disappointments of rural New Yorkers.
